org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.components.scale

Class Ramp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.components.scale.Ramp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScale
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExponentialRamp, LogarithmicRamp

    public abstract class Ramp
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScale
    This ramp is built from two points and creates a ramp function that takes an x value as an input and gives a y value as output. The ramp also can take in a y value and give the inverse.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ramp(Point point1, Point point2)
      This ramp's function -- f(x) -- is built using the two points passed into the constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ramp

        public Ramp(Point point1,
            Point point2)
        This ramp's function -- f(x) -- is built using the two points passed into the constructor. From these points it builds a logarithmic function
        Parameters:
        point1 - The first point the exponential ramp run through.
        point2 - The second point the exponential ramp runs through.
        See Also:
        Point
